IntegerParameter.Name: sw_flag
IntegerParameter.Description: AGC version: 0 is v1.05; 1 is v1.1; 3 is v1.2; 5 is v1.1+v1.3; 7 is v1.2+v1.3

IntegerParameter.Name: ld_gain_lo_lim
IntegerParameter.Description: Total gain lower limit. Class 1 parameter. Default=0

IntegerParameter.Name: ld_gain_up_lim
IntegerParameter.Description: Total gain upper limit. Class 1 parameter. Default=5120

IntegerParameter.Name: nr_shl_ri_min
IntegerParameter.Description: Number of left shifts in minimum detector for rising signals. Class 2 parameter. Default=-12

IntegerParameter.Name: nr_shl_fa_min
IntegerParameter.Description: Number of left shifts in minimum detector for falling signals. Class 2 parameter. Default=-2

IntegerParameter.Name: nr_shl_ri_max
IntegerParameter.Description: Number of left shifts in maximum detector for rising signals. Class 2 parameter. Default=-2

IntegerParameter.Name: nr_shl_fa_max
IntegerParameter.Description: Number of left shifts in maximum detector for falling signals. Class 2 parameter. Default=-2

IntegerParameter.Name: nr_shli_filt
IntegerParameter.Description: Number of left shifts for smoothing total gain. Class 1 parameter. Default=-1

IntegerParameter.Name: trigger_offset
IntegerParameter.Description: Trigger offset on the decision logic to allow more double-talk. Class 1 parameter. Default=3072

EnumParameter.Name: sub_frame_ratio_shifts
EnumParameter.Description: Two-exponent for the number of sub-frames. Class 2 parameter. Default=2

IntegerParameter.Name: far_shift_ri
IntegerParameter.Description: Number of left shifts for smoothing reference line power (when rising). Class 2 parameter. Default=0

IntegerParameter.Name: far_shift_fa
IntegerParameter.Description: Number of left shifts for smoothing reference line power (when falling). Class 2 parameter. Default=-4

IntegerParameter.Name: far_power_center
IntegerParameter.Description: Center threshold on far-end power. Class 1 parameter. Default=6144

IntegerParameter.Name: far_power_distorted
IntegerParameter.Description: Distortion threshold on far-end power. Class 1 parameter. Default=12288

FixedPointParameter.Name: far_over_est_r0
FixedPointParameter.Description: Lower over-estimation ratio. Class 1 parameter. Default=256

FixedPointParameter.Name: far_over_est_r1
FixedPointParameter.Description: Middle over-estimation ratio. Class 1 parameter. Default=282

FixedPointParameter.Name: far_over_est_r2
FixedPointParameter.Description: Upper over-estimation ratio. Class 1 parameter. Default=307

IntegerParameter.Name: trigger_shift_ri
IntegerParameter.Description: Number of left shifts for smoothing rising trigger signal. Class 2 parameter. Default=-1

IntegerParameter.Name: trigger_shift_fa
IntegerParameter.Description: Number of left shifts for smoothing falling trigger signal. Class 2 parameter. Default=-1

IntegerParameter.Name: trigger_over_est_ratio
IntegerParameter.Description: Trigger level over-estimation ratio. Class 2 parameter. Default=768

FixedPointParameter.Name: miss_alignment_thresh
FixedPointParameter.Description: Threshold level for mis alignment sent from AEC. Class 2 parameter. Default=4000

FixedPointParameter.Name: miss_alignment_mult
FixedPointParameter.Description: Multiplier for mis alignment sent from AEC. Class 2 parameter. Default=8192

FixedPointParameter.Name: fb_coefs
FixedPointParameter.Description: AGC filter bank coefficients. Class 1 parameter.
